name: Finch Oregano Leaves
description:
One of the world’s very best-loved cooking herbs, oregano is both robust and dynamic. Use this
top-quality dried oregano to add power and depth to the flavour of Italian, Mediterranean, Aegan,
Middle Eastern, North African, Asian, and South American cuisine of every colour. As you may
know, this herb works brilliantly with a huge range of flavours. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
